QuestData.Title: The Zanchuli Council
QuestData.Description: You there, Speaker of de Horde.$b$bMy spies have told me of dark heresies being practiced in our sacred temple of Zanchul.$b$bDe king sent Loti and Raal to deal with de situation, but those two bickering council members are soft on their own followers.$b$bWe need someone more... ruthlessly neutral.$b$bGo meet Wardruid Loti down at de Zocalo and she can tell you de rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Wardruid Loti in the Zocalo.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Wardruid Loti in the Zocalo.
